ShortDescription.Value: Display current system time in CSL2 toolbar.

Publish.LongDescription:
**This mod displays the current system time in the toolbar.**
### Features
- Toolbar clock displaying system time - Customizable display format - Option to making the clock blink every hour (require enabling in the settings)
### Motivation
Since the wonderful [System Clock Mod](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/107257/Windows) hasn't been updated for 1.3.6f1, I figured maybe I can put together a replacement so I don't lose track of time ever so often. So, welcome to my first experimental mod for Cities: Skylines II, which is also my first C#/React/TypeScript project.
Enjoy!
(As a general precaution when using mods, remember to **always backup your saves**.)
### Acknowledgements
Thank you @rcav8tr for your very helpful and detailed [guide](https://github.com/rcav8tr/CS2-Modding-Instructions) on CSL2 Modding. This mod couldn't have happened without you.
Thank you @liberaldev / ssharp0 for your [SystemClockMod](https://github.com/liberaldev/SystemClockMod) which is of much inspirations for this project.
Publish.ChangeLog: - The optional blinking is now three times as fast and 3s longer, in order to increase noticeability.
